nodes.bodyText: @srnagar if serialization.xml.name isn't available - it doesn't seem right to use the array schema's xml name for the item name. For now I'm using the name of the item as a fallback and seems to generate this correctly so far.
Just using azure-core-http-netty as dependency would transitively bring in azure-core as well. Also, we have 1.5.0 as the latest netty version.
Ideally, netty could be in test scope.
